sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A briefe censure vpon the Puritane pamphlet entituled, (humble motyves, for association to maintayne religion established.) Reprooving of it so many vntruthes, as there be leaues in the same.
75 [i.e. 91], [1] p.
English Secret Press], [England : Printed M. DI. III. [sic] [1603]
Anonymous response to: "Humble motives for association to maintaine religion established" (STC 3518), the first part of which is signed: T. Diggs. Roman numeral date is misprinted on title page. The words "humble .. established" on title page are enclosed within parentheses. Page 91 is misnumbered. Place of publication and press from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
